name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-web-parts-knockout-sp-pnp-js
title: Sample showing the use of @pnp/sp library with Knockoutjs
shortDescription: This web part demonstrates how to integrate the @pnp/sp library into the SharePoint Framework as well as including mock data and simple list I/O.
longDescription: This web part demonstrates how to integrate the @pnp/sp library into the SharePoint Framework as well as including mock data and simple list I/O.

thumbnails.alt: Sample showing the use of @pnp/sp library with Knockoutjs

references.name: Build your first SharePoint client-side web part
references.description: Client-side web parts are client-side components that run in the context of a SharePoint page. Client-side web parts can be deployed to SharePoint environments that support the SharePoint Framework. You can also use modern JavaScript web frameworks, tools, and libraries to build them.
